TextView.tools:text: System Requirements Windows Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/10 (32- or 64-bit) 2 GB RAM minimum, 8 GB RAM recommended 2 GB of available disk space minimum, 4 GB Recommended (500 MB for IDE + 1.5 GB for Android SDK and emulator system image) 1280 x 800 minimum screen resolution Java Development Kit (JDK) 8 For accelerated emulator: 64-bit operating system and Intel® processor with support for Intel® VT-x, Intel® EM64T (Intel® 64), and Execute Disable (XD) Bit functionality
